pullRequest.body:
---

- [x] depends on: #12662

<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
Thanks! Please wait for the upstream PR before merging. 

bors d+

:v: grunweg can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
(Of course, when #11019 lands, such an exception can also be made in the Lean version.)

Michael, I did not realize that you posted this here as well.  #12675 allows adaptation notes.  I'm not sure that I understand your question about `#help`: it should pick up adaptation notes on its own, I think.

Sorry for the double-post; I realised later that #12662 exposed this already.
Given there's a fix for the linter, whatever question I had is resolved: essentially I was asking how to fix this.

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#12662~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (ðŸ¤–). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->
bors r+

Build failed:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8967245044/job/24624383589)
bors r+

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8969685480/job/24631562647)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8969685480/job/24631564168)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8969685480/job/24631564594)
Writing #adapation_note here errors, hence I moved this comment before the function.

I think these should rather be porting notes. (Also applies in a few more places.)
I could be wrong about these, though!
General question: should AdaptationNote be added to Tactic.Common? (I'm fine with not. The current situation added a little bit of fraction to the conversion, but that was a one-time event.)
Let's leave it out for now.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: use #adaptation_note for labelling adaptation notes
